summary: This document appears to be a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing various account types and requirements for individuals and organizations. It includes information on customer identification policies, joint account disclosures, and responsibilities regarding tax compliance. The document emphasizes the importance of verifying identities to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
keyFacts: The document outlines the requirements for opening a deposit account with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It emphasizes the need for customer identification to comply with federal laws against money laundering and terrorism financing.
The document includes provisions for joint accounts and the rights of account holders regarding withdrawals and ownership.
There are references to tax obligations for non-US individuals and organizations in relation to their accounts.
The document mentions the necessity for clients to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
